project.name: openskills
project.tagline: Universal Skill Loader for AI Coding Agents
project.description: Enable any AI coding agent (Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Aider, etc.) to use standard SKILL.md format skills. Unified standard, progressive loading, multi-agent support.

features.title: Why OpenSkills?
features.subtitle: Unified skill format that works across any agent. Say goodbye to platform lock-in.

list.title: Fully Compatible with Claude Code
list.desc: Same prompt format, same marketplace, same folder structure. Seamless migration.

list.title: Multi-Agent Support
list.desc: Supports Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Aider, Codex, and all agents that can read AGENTS.md.

list.title: Progressive Loading
list.desc: Load skills on demand, keeping agent context concise and focused. Avoid context pollution.

list.title: Flexible Installation Sources
list.desc: Install skills from GitHub, local paths, or private git repositories. Adapts to various scenarios.

list.title: Universal Mode
list.desc: One skill set serves multiple agents. Avoid conflicts with Claude Code. Unified skill management.

list.title: Pure Local Execution
list.desc: CLI tool requires no server. All operations completed on local file system. Privacy guaranteed.
